title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) and the busy cursor is not shown.
OB: The checked state of the table takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update, and the busy cursor is not displayed.
EB: The checked state of the table should update quickly, within a reasonable time frame, and the busy cursor should be shown during the update.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Observe the table as it updates the checked state.
3. Notice that it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) for the update to complete.
4. Verify that the busy cursor is not shown during the update.
